name: DM Control Plugin
description: This plugin allows admins to control direct messages and group chats based on user roles and other criteria.

settings.help_text: If enabled, direct messages will be disabled for new users when they join.

settings.display_name: Disable Group Messages for New Users
settings.help_text: If enabled, group messages will be disabled for new users when they join.
If enabled, direct messages will be disabled for all existing users unless they have an allowed role.

settings.display_name: Disable Group Messages for Existing Users
settings.help_text: If enabled, group messages will be disabled for all existing users unless they have an allowed role.
Comma-separated list of usernames that are excluded from DM and GM restrictions.
Comma-separated list of roles allowed to send DMs and participate in group chats. E.g., system_admin,custom_role
